metadata.title: CVE-2016-1564 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities inwp-includes/class-wp-theme.php in WordPress before 4.4.1 allow remoteattackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a (1) stylesheet nameor (2) template name to wp-admin/customize.php.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
